# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  lib4.lib lib3.lib test2_nolib.cir test2.cir test2.cir.sh rlc.cir rlc.cir.tags rlc.cir.options rlc.cir.sh rlc.lib exclude tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/test2.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rlc.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} rlc.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} rlc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;errorexit;bug907")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} rlc.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} rlc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/rlc.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;errorexit;bug907")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/test2.cir.sh COMMAND bash test2.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} test2.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/test2.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/test2.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bug907")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/test2.cir.sh COMMAND bash test2.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} test2.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/test2.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_907_SON/test2.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bug907")
endif()
